sentences: Rep. Joe Kennedy III (D-MA) claimed the host-city of his response to President Donald Trump’s State of the Union address, Fall River, Massachusetts was “built by immigrants.”
label: true_

sentences: A native-born family, the Bordens ran a mill in what became the town for generations before and after the American revolution.
label: true_

sentences: Industrialization began when Col. Joseph Durfee, a native-born Revolutionary War hero built the first factory in 1811.
label: true_

sentences: Later, at the end of the 19th Century a wave of immigrants swelled the town’s population.
label: true_

sentences: Immigrants, however, never made up a majority of the population of Bristol County, where Fall River lies, even at their early 20th Century peak.
label: true_
